title: 7/5/17 - Values and Heroes
description:
Who is baby Charlie Gard?...The Vatican to the rescue ...Standing for the rights of the 'individual' ...The press set their own standards and they are not even close to the average American ...President Trump Tweets a video...Wrestling beat down video is no joke ...North Korea's ICBM fireworks weekend ...Only China holds the key to North Korea's future ...Where's the UN when you need them?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
